meanings.sent1: She likes to read books in the park.
meanings.sent2: He likes ice cream on hot days.
meanings.sent3: The cat likes to nap in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The flower likes the gentle touch of the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The child likes the sound of laughter.

meanings.definition: Similar to; in the same way as
meanings.sent1: She runs likes the wind, swift and free.
meanings.sent2: He sings likes a bird, with joy in his heart.
meanings.sent3: The river flows likes a ribbon through the valley.
meanings.sent4: The leaves rustle likes whispers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The stars shine likes diamonds in the night sky.

meanings.sent1: Her post received many likes from friends.
meanings.sent2: The video got thousands of likes on the platform.
meanings.sent3: The cat's photo got more likes than expected.
meanings.sent4: The meme generated a lot of likes and shares.
meanings.sent5: The influencer's post got a record number of likes.
